narrative:
This is a focus inspection limited to inspection of the tiger incident and the associated tiger housing areas.
The incident involving the tiger and the keeper is under review.
The exit interview was conducted with the General Curator.
Inspection performed by Robert Brandes, D.V.M. & Mario Mercado, D.V.M.
